boardgame.name: Before the Wind
Les vents du nord
Voor de Wind
Vor dem Wind
boardgame.description: In the harbor a fleet of commerce ships is waiting to be loaded with goods. Each vessel needs a certain combination of goods. The players take the roles of traders, trying to fill their warehouses with goods which are then in turn transferred to the ships in the harbor. They have to pay attention to the right combination of goods because the captains only accept the goods from a single trader and expect a complete delivery before their ships leave the harbor. It is also very important to not let the right moment to transfer goods to the vessels pass, because the fleet will leave the harbor when the storage space is full and the winds are helpful. The players always have to be before the wind to actively influence the events._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Contents_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 120 action cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 60 goods cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 60 Guilders cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 46 ship cards_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 4 warehouses_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 starting player token_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 1 rules booklet_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
